metadata.name: Is this role being posted for the immigration team?

title: Facilities Manager
content:
Chewy is seeking a Facilities Manager at its MDT1 Fulfillment Center. In this role you will lead a Maintenance Team responsible for maintaining and improving the reliability of general warehouse assets and production equipment such as conveyor systems, industrial automation systems, inventory storage solutions, and powered industrial trucks. In this role you will oversee the management of a team of technicians, directly manage minimum of one Facilities Area Manager, partner closely with Chewy Operations and other stakeholder teams, and leverage third party vendors for specialized maintenance work. 
What you’ll do: 

Manage a team of maintenance leaders and technicians responsible for the reliability and performance of general warehouse assets and production equipment in an e-commerce fulfillment center. 
Utilize data to measure and manage the performance of your team. 
Manage high severity downtime events and lead root cause analysis and corrective actions. 
Manage preventative and reactive equipment repairs. 
Lead continuous improvement projects that target key performance indicators such as injury rates, equipment uptime, mean time to repair, and system capacity. 
Initiate Capital Expenditure projects in support of high-level building and network projects. 
Manage maintenance procurement activities, tracking expenses to ensure deliverables are met or exceeded within the prescribed budget. 
Partner with internal and external stakeholders to achieve business objectives. 
Manage third party vendors performing work for Chewy.  

What you’ll need: 

Bachelor's Degree or equivalent work experience. 
5+ years of experience managing maintenance or operations teams in a warehouse or factory. 
5+ years of experience working with material handling equipment such as conveyors and powered industrial trucks. 
Experience using information systems and data to measure and improve key performance indicators. 
Ability to provide a high level of customer service to a variety of cross-functional stakeholders. 
Ability to simultaneously support multiple high priority projects in a fast-paced environment. 
Ability to work a schedule that may include weekends, nights, and holidays. 
Ability to travel as needed. 

Bonus: 

Master's Degree. 
Experience maintaining electromechanical material handling systems. 
Experience maintaining industrial control systems.  
Experience maintaining electrical systems.  
Competence using a computerized maintenance management system. 

 Chewy is committed to equal opportunity. We value and embrace diversity and inclusion of all Team Members. If you have a disability under the Americans with Disabilities Act or similar law, and you need an accommodation during the application process or to perform these job requirements, or if you need a religious accommodation, please contact CAAR@chewy.com.
 
If you have a question regarding your application, please contact HR@chewy.com.
 
To access Chewy's Customer Privacy Policy, please click here. To access Chewy's California CPRA Job Applicant Privacy Policy, please click here.

SMS Consent: By providing my telephone number on this employment application form, I consent to receive automated text messages and pre-recorded voice messages from Chewy at that telephone number regarding any matter related to my job application to Chewy. Chewy will not use this telephone number for marketing or advertising solicitation purposes. Message and data rates may apply. You may opt out of these messages at any time by replying 'STOP' to any text messages you receive.

Arbitration Agreement Signed?
Arbitration Agreement Signed Date

Deloitte is Chewy’s independent auditor. To not impair Deloitte's independence, Chewy must validate the role of any current or former Deloitte employee against any exempt role they are interviewing for at Chewy. Do you currently work for Deloitte or have you ever been employed by Deloitte in the past?

Close family ties to a Deloitte employee could also impair Deloitte’s independence as Chewy’s auditor should you become employed by Chewy.  Do you have a close family member (spouse or equivalent, parent, dependent, non-dependent child, and/or sibling) that currently works for Deloitte?
